feat\(schema\): add conversation state and author type enums

Add whatsappConversationStateEnum for tracking WhatsApp conversation
flow states \(idle, awaiting_email, awaiting_otp, awaiting_property,
awaiting_description, awaiting_photos, incident_active, and
awaiting_closure_confirmation\).

Add incidentAuthorTypeEnum for tracking who made comments on incidents
\(tenant, agent, landlord, system\).
